text: Roodt-sur-Syre () is a village in the commune of Betzdorf in eastern Luxembourg. It is part of the canton of Grevenmacher. It is about 15 km from Luxembourg City. The town is on the river Syre. As of 2024, 2,017 people live here. Category:Villages in Europe Category:Settlements in Luxembourg Category:Canton of Grevenmacher
title: Roodt-sur-Syre
